verbose_text: Consistent with SLM2 mRNAs with alternative end 2 being an unstable mRNA population that is normally targeted for destruction through nonsense mediated decay, human SLM2 mRNA isoforms with alternative end 2 were induced by overexpression of SLM2 protein, and strongly stabilized by the addition of cycloheximide (XREF_FIG C, compare lanes 3 and 6).
